item.title: Compass - Use transform in compass 1.0.1
Web Develop - Flexible Footer
item.description: Web Develop - Flexible Footer Sometimes we think footer must fixed in website bottom or put it in last of content. I provide a idea may be a good way. Content less browser view height, footer fixed in bottom. When content too much over browser view height, footer be put last of content. Feature flexible only use CSS Usage min-height: calc(100% - <footer height>); #hd { height: 50px; background: #aaa; /*display: none;*/ } #bd { text-align: center; min-height: calc(100% - 50px); /* important */ background: #ccc; } #content { padding-bottom: 60px; } #footer { position: relative; bottom: 50px; text-align: center; height: 50px; background: #999; } 50px is footer height
